DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety Peginterferon alfa-2b ( 40KD , Y shape , following refer Ypeginterferon alfa-2b short ) , dose 180μg/week , combination Ribavirin Chinese chronic hepatitis C patient . The study first group patient two sub-study , genotype 2/3 non-genotype 2/3 , depend HCV genotype infect . In genotype 2/3 sub-study 219 patient enrol , eligible patient randomize 2:1 ratio Ypeginterferon alfa-2b group active control group ( Pegasys ) , receive 24 week interferon therapy oral daily Ribavirin dose 800mg/d . In non-genotype 2/3 sub-study 507 patient enrol , eligible patient randomize 2:1 ratio Ypeginterferon alfa-2b group active control group ( Pegasys ) , receive 48 week interferon therapy oral daily Ribavirin 1000-1200mg/day , base body weight . All patient follow 24 week end therapy .
